notes: Cross-platform Amiga emulator based on WinUAE with focus on gaming; supports CD32/CDTV; has built-in WHDLoad support
Most accurate and fully-featured Amiga emulator; Windows only; supports CD32 through configuration
LibRetro core based on P-UAE/WinUAE; auto-detects CD32 when loading CD images; requires CD32 kickstart ROMs
